document_data.name: Sembian Swill
document_data.mainbody: '''Sembian Swill''' was a type of a distilled alcoholic drink found in the city of [[Westgate]] and the nation of [[Sembia]].
document_data.Description: This concoction was distilled from [[furbid]] plant's root. It was dark in color and bitter to taste. Tavernkeepers often claimed that Sembian Swill was created with a single purposeâ€”to topple a [[horse]] with a single gulp of the drink.
document_data.History: By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Sembian Swill was served in many of Westgate's inns and bard, including [[The Track]], the underground racing rink, and gambling establishment on the [[Market Triangle]].
